messages.content: What’s my subscription status?
You can view your subscription status under Account > Billing in the dashboard. It shows your plan, next billing date, and usage.
How do I connect Salesforce via the UI?
Go to Account > Integrations, click Connect next to Salesforce, and follow the OAuth prompts.
Fetch the contact record for Acme Inc.
Use: “@salesforce get contact Acme Inc.” to retrieve that record.
Show me Q1 revenue by region.
Use: “@netsuite run report revenue_by_region quarter=Q1 year=2025”.
When is my next invoice due?
Your next invoice is due on 2025-08-01. You can see details under Account > Billing.
Explain Magic UI scheduling.
Magic UI lets you write natural commands like “schedule meeting” and it converts them into @googlecalendar actions.
I can’t log in—help!
If you’re having login issues, try resetting your password via the login page or contact support@askcipher.com.
Enable two-factor authentication.
Go to Account > Security, toggle on Two-Factor Authentication, and follow the setup steps.
Find all events containing 'demo' next week.
Use: “@googlecalendar list events filter='demo' from=2025-07-14 to=2025-07-20”.
Block out time daily from 12–1 PM.
Use: “@googlecalendar schedule recurring event 'Lunch Break' RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;BYHOUR=12;BYMINUTE=0;BYSECOND=0 DURATION=PT1H”.
Book the main conference room for Monday at 3 PM.
Use: “@googlecalendar schedule event 'Conference Room Booking' on 2025-07-14 at 3 PM location='Main Conf Room'.”
List all demos scheduled this month.
Use: “@googlecalendar list events filter='demo' from=2025-07-01 to=2025-07-31”.
Add Sarah Lee to my team.
Go to Account > Team > Invite Members and enter Sarah’s email to add her.
Remove Michael Ross from the account.
Go to Account > Team, find Michael Ross, and click Remove User.
Change default language to Spanish.
Go to Account > Profile > Language and select Spanish, then log out and back in.
Turn off email notifications.
Go to Settings > Notifications and toggle off Email Alerts.
Do you comply with GDPR?
Yes—we comply with GDPR. You can request data exports or deletions under Settings > Data & Privacy.
How do I get your SOC 2 report?
Email compliance@askcipher.com with an NDA request, and we’ll share the SOC 2 report.
Who is the DPO?
You can reach our Data Protection Officer at privacy@askcipher.com.
Request audit logs for last month.
Go to Security > Audit Logs, set the date filter, and click Export CSV.
How much data have I used?
Usage metrics are under Analytics > Usage. You can see API calls, data processed, and more.
Reset my password link expired.
No problem—request a new reset link on the login page via “Forgot password?”.
Where can I find the developer SDK?
SDKs are listed in Integration Docs under Developer Resources: Python, JavaScript, Java, and more.
What roles can I assign to users?
We support Admin, Editor, Viewer, and Custom roles. Go to Account > Team to manage roles.
Promote John to Admin.
Go to Account > Team, click John’s profile, and change his role to Admin.
Downgrade Emily to Viewer.
Navigate to Account > Team, find Emily, and set her role to Viewer.
What platform versions are supported?
We support the latest three major browser versions (Chrome, Firefox, Edge) and mobile browsers.
Import contacts from CSV.
Use: “@salesforce import contacts file=contacts.csv” after uploading the file in Integrations.
Export my customer list as PDF.
Use: “@salesforce export contacts format=pdf” to generate a PDF of your contacts.
Schedule a weekly sync every Tuesday at 9 AM.
Use: “@googlecalendar schedule recurring event 'Weekly Sync' RRULE:FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=TU;BYHOUR=9;BYMINUTE=0”.
Set a daily reminder to check loads.
Use: “@googlecalendar schedule recurring event 'Check Loads' RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;BYHOUR=8;BYMINUTE=0”.
Convert an invoice to draft.
Use: “@netsuite update invoice INV-001 status=draft” to change the status.
Get the status of purchase order PO123.
Use: “@netsuite get purchase_order PO123 status”.
View my login history.
Go to Account > Security > Login History to view your recent logins.
Enable debug logging.
Debug logs can be toggled under Settings > Integrations > Debug Mode.
How do I use the Python SDK?
Check the Python SDK guide in Integration Docs under Developer Resources.
Where do I download the Java SDK?
Java SDK downloads are available in Integration Docs under Java Developer Resources.
Show me a demo video.
Watch our demo at https://askcipher.com/demo-video or via the Help menu in-app.
Who are your expert partners?
We partner with leading consultancies in NetSuite, Salesforce, and Google Cloud—see Partners on our site.
Can I connect Zapier?
Zapier isn’t integrated yet. We’ll announce it when available.
Enable mobile push notifications.
Go to Settings > Notifications > Mobile Push and toggle it On.
Support Slack integration?
Slack isn’t supported currently—our integrations are Google Calendar, Salesforce, and NetSuite.
Add a note to opportunity OPP-456.
Use: “@salesforce add note to opportunity OPP-456 content='Your note here'”.
Schedule a birthday reminder for July 20.
Use: “@googlecalendar schedule event 'Birthday Reminder' on 2025-07-20 at 9 AM”.
Export usage metrics as CSV.
Go to Analytics > Usage, click Export CSV to download your metrics.
Regenerate my OAuth token.
Go to Account > Integrations, find the integration, and click Regenerate Token.
Where can I change my display name?
Go to Account > Profile > Display Name to edit how your name appears.
How do I contact sales engineering?
Email se@askcipher.com to reach our sales engineering team.
What’s your data backup schedule?
We back up all data daily at 02:00 UTC with 30-day retention.
